text: Plum Grove School is a historic one-room school located near Laclede, Linn County, Missouri. It was built about 1905, and is a one-story, gable end, frame building. Also on the property is a contributing coal house with woodshed. The school closed in 1947. (includes 11 photographs from 1994) It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1994. ==References== Category:One-room schoolhouses in Missouri Category:School buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:School buildings completed in 1905 Category:Buildings and structures in Linn County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Linn County, Missouri Category:1905 establishments in Missouri
title: Plum Grove School
